name: Fire's Stuff Site
tagline: A collection of all my things
body:
###Source Mapping
You can find all of my released or work in progress Source Engine maps [here](http://fires1.github.io/SourceMapping/)

###Modeling/Art
This will eventually lead to a site with all my animated things, Blender models, SFM animations/posters and other assorted 3D/2D art stuff
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
